Others: The Phillies had a seven-game lead over the Mets with 10 games to play.
The Phillies had a 34-game winning streak when their starter pitched seven or more innings. It was the longest streak in franchise history and the second-longest streak in MLB history.
The Phillies struck out 16 times on Wednesday, marking the first time in franchise history the Phillies had struck out 16-plus times in consecutive games.
The Phillies and Brewers could meet again in the NL Championship Series.
